posts.post_content:
For those of you who came up empty handed in Goodwin last night here's your chance. Price shown includes shipping and insurance to your door.
 Paypal a-okay with no added fee. Just drop me an email if you see one you like. All are fantastic for the grade. Scan of all front and back below.
 Thanks all, Tony

[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]
